analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Gryphon.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/46/0x47584af952b675d35b20ce9eaf0cd95a9924812a.sol#183-207):
	External calls:
	- vault.deposit.value(_value)(_recipient) (/unique_chucks/46/0x47584af952b675d35b20ce9eaf0cd95a9924812a.sol#196-197)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- preSaleRaised (/unique_chucks/46/0x47584af952b675d35b20ce9eaf0cd95a9924812a.sol#197-198)

Gryphon.isPreSalePeriod (/unique_chucks/46/0x47584af952b675d35b20ce9eaf0cd95a9924812a.sol#389-399) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- Gryphon.crowdSaleState

Gryphon.isICOPeriod (/unique_chucks/46/0x47584af952b675d35b20ce9eaf0cd95a9924812a.sol#399-409) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- Gryphon.crowdSaleState

Reentrancy in Gryphon.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/46/0x47584af952b675d35b20ce9eaf0cd95a9924812a.sol#183-207):
	External calls:
	- vault.deposit.value(_value)(_recipient) (/unique_chucks/46/0x47584af952b675d35b20ce9eaf0cd95a9924812a.sol#203-204)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- icoRaised (/unique_chucks/46/0x47584af952b675d35b20ce9eaf0cd95a9924812a.sol#205-206)

Gryphon.transfer (/unique_chucks/46/0x47584af952b675d35b20ce9eaf0cd95a9924812a.sol#256-290) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(vested[msg.sender] >= _tokens_in_cents) (/unique_chucks/46/0x47584af952b675d35b20ce9eaf0cd95a9924812a.sol#263-264)

Gryphon.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/46/0x47584af952b675d35b20ce9eaf0cd95a9924812a.sol#305-333) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(vested[_from] >= _tokens_in_cents) (/unique_chucks/46/0x47584af952b675d35b20ce9eaf0cd95a9924812a.sol#313-314)

Gryphon.approve (/unique_chucks/46/0x47584af952b675d35b20ce9eaf0cd95a9924812a.sol#333-339) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(vested[msg.sender] >= _tokens_in_cents) (/unique_chucks/46/0x47584af952b675d35b20ce9eaf0cd95a9924812a.sol#334-337)

Gryphon.getVested (/unique_chucks/46/0x47584af952b675d35b20ce9eaf0cd95a9924812a.sol#224-255) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < start (/unique_chucks/46/0x47584af952b675d35b20ce9eaf0cd95a9924812a.sol#233-255)
	- vested_now > total_vested[_beneficiary] (/unique_chucks/46/0x47584af952b675d35b20ce9eaf0cd95a9924812a.sol#248-254)
	- block.timestamp >= start.add(duration) (/unique_chucks/46/0x47584af952b675d35b20ce9eaf0cd95a9924812a.sol#238-255)
